content:
I am a pre-doctoral research assistant at ETH Zürich, Center for Law & Economics.
Currently, I am studying machine learning and natural language processing for future academic research. You can download my C.V. here [PDF].

title: Léo Picard

content:
I made a dashboard for visualizing the amount and date of payment from Member States to the yearly United Nations Regular Budget.
You can access it here: https://leops95.shinyapps.io/unbudget
Dataset and sources can be found on my GitHub repository.
title: Contributions to the United Nations Regular Budget

content:
Usually held at the beginning of each year, U.S. governors give a public speech where they talk about the situation of their state. Frequency of the speech varies from state to state, as it is sometimes held every two year, or ‘from time to time’. They can be supported by an inauguration speech after an election year, or a state of the budget speech.
Dataset, metadata and raw files can be found on my GitHub repository.
title: U.S. State of the State transcripts
